00004 VertexSet* TerrainPatch::generateDrawLOD(float* heightData, float* UV, unsigned int patchSize, unsigned int stride, unsigned int* lodPatchSize)
00005 {
00006 
00007     unsigned int numPointsPerRow = ((patchSize - 1) / stride) + 1;
00008 
00009     //4 because there are 4 vertices per point
00010     float* verticesTemp = new float[(numPointsPerRow - 1) * numPointsPerRow * 2 * 3];
00011     float* tempUVs = new float[(numPointsPerRow - 1) * numPointsPerRow * 2 * 2];
00012 
00013     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (numPointsPerRow - 1) * numPointsPerRow * 2 * 3; ++i)
00014     {
00015         verticesTemp[i] = 0;
00016     }
00017 
00018     unsigned int nextVertexStart = 0;
00019     unsigned int nextUVStart = 0;
00020 
00021     for (unsigned int z = 0; z < patchSize - 1; z += stride)
00022     {
00023 
00024         for (unsigned int x = 0; x < patchSize; x += stride)
00025         {
00026 
00027             unsigned int uvDataStartPos = ((z * patchSize) + x) * 2;
00028             unsigned int heightDataStart = ( ( z * patchSize) + x);
00029 
00030             verticesTemp[nextVertexStart] = x;
00031             verticesTemp[nextVertexStart + 1] = heightData[heightDataStart];
00032             verticesTemp[nextVertexStart + 2] = z;
00033 
00034             tempUVs[nextUVStart] = UV[uvDataStartPos];
00035             tempUVs[nextUVStart + 1] = UV[uvDataStartPos + 1];
00036 
00037             nextUVStart += 2;
00038 
00039             nextVertexStart += 3;
00040 
00041             heightDataStart = ( ( (z + stride) * patchSize) + x);
00042 
00043             verticesTemp[nextVertexStart] = x;
00044             verticesTemp[nextVertexStart + 1] = heightData[heightDataStart];
00045             verticesTemp[nextVertexStart + 2] = z + stride;
00046 
00047             nextVertexStart += 3;
00048 
00049             uvDataStartPos = (((z + stride) * patchSize) + x) * 2;
00050             tempUVs[nextUVStart] = UV[uvDataStartPos];
00051             tempUVs[nextUVStart + 1] = UV[uvDataStartPos + 1];
00052 
00053             nextUVStart += 2;
00054 
00055         }
00056 
00057     }
00058 
00059 
00060     VertexSet* returnSet = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->newVertexSet();
00061 
00062     returnSet->setVertices(verticesTemp, (patchSize - 1) * patchSize * 2);
00063     returnSet->setTextureCoordinates(tempUVs, (patchSize - 1) * patchSize * 2);
00064 
00065     delete[] verticesTemp;
00066     delete[] tempUVs;
00067 
00068     *lodPatchSize = numPointsPerRow;
00069 
00070     return returnSet;
00071 }

00073 TerrainPatch::TerrainPatch(float* heightData, float* UV, unsigned int patchSize)
00074 {
00075     printf("Allocating patch VSet\n");
00076 
00077     m_numLods = 0;
00078 
00079     unsigned int stride = 1;
00080 
00081     while (1)
00082     {
00083         m_numLods++;
00084 
00085         stride = stride * 2;
00086         if (stride == (patchSize - 1)) break;
00087 
00088     }
00089 
00090     printf("Num LODs %i\n", m_numLods);
00091 
00092     m_patchVSetLods = new VertexSet*[m_numLods];
00093     m_lodNumVs = new unsigned int[m_numLods];
00094 
00095     stride = 1;
00096 
00097     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_numLods; ++i)
00098     {
00099         m_patchVSetLods[i] = generateDrawLOD(heightData, UV, patchSize, stride, &m_lodNumVs[i]);
00100         stride = stride * 2;
00101     }
00102 
00103 /*
00104     m_patchSize = patchSize;
00105 
00106     unsigned int newPatchSize = 0;
00107     m_patchVSet = generateDrawLOD(heightData, UV, patchSize, 32, &newPatchSize);
00108     m_patchSize = newPatchSize; */
00109 }

00123 void TerrainPatch::draw(unsigned int lod)
00124 {
00125     if (lod >= m_numLods) lod = m_numLods - 1;
00126     if (lod < m_numLods)
00127     {
00128         VertexSet* vSet = m_patchVSetLods[lod];
00129         unsigned int rInc = m_lodNumVs[lod];
00130         unsigned int cStart = 0;
00131 
00132         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rInc - 1; ++i)
00133         {
00134             vSet->Draw(cStart, rInc * 2, TRIANGLE_STRIP);
00135             cStart += rInc * 2;
00136         }
00137     }
00138 
00139     /*

00141 
00142     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_patchSize - 1; ++i)
